text:
. These individuals are called carriers. Although ATM mutation carriers do not have ataxia-telangiectasia, they are more likely than people without an ATM mutation to develop cancer; female carriers are particularly at risk for developing breast cancer. Carriers of a mutation in the ATM gene also may have an increased risk of heart disease.",GHR,ataxia-telangiectasia
What are the treatments for ataxia-telangiectasia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of ataxia-telangiectasia:
